department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Supervised Reading and Research
course.faculty_text: Robert D. Howe and Sujata K. Bhatia (fall term), Sujata K. Bhatia (spring term)
course.notes: Normally open to candidates accepted for work on a specific topic by a member of the teaching staff of the School of Engineering and Applied Sciences. Normally may not be taken for more than two terms; may be counted for concentration in Biomedical Engineering if taken for graded credit. Applicants should file a project sheet before study cards are filed. Project sheets may be obtained from the Student Affairs Office, Pierce Hall 110.
